message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.CV 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing and specifically focuses on neural machine translation. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of deep learning techniques, which are commonly used in the field of CS.CL. 

The paper also discusses the integration of context in NMT, which could potentially fall under the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). 

Furthermore, the paper mentions the use of encoding for context modeling, which could fall under the sub-category of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). 

Finally, the paper discusses the use of long context in NMT, which could potentially fall under the sub-category of cs.CV (Computer Vision) as long context could be related to image captioning tasks.
